q1: How would you rate Liverpool's transfer business this summer?
a1: I think it was a good thing for them
q2: Do you think Liverpool can win the league with their new transfers?
a2: Absolutely.  Jurgan Klopp is an excellent leader and Salah is the best goal scorer in the Premier League.
q3: Do you think Salah will be willing to follow Klopp's direction?
a3: If he stays in Liverpool, then yes
q4: Who thinks Liverpool will win it all?
a4: I do! They have many good players
q5: Will they focus on winning the Premier League or on winning Champion's League?
